name: Cinemoji: Halloween
description:
Test your deduction skills and your horror movies knowledge

See plot summary of the movies

Some filmemojis are hard to guess

Features:


  • 100 handcrafted horror movies filmemojis to guess.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Halloween theme.
  • Type the answer with keyboard or click in buttons with mouse.
  • Plot summary of the movies.
  • It's pretty hard to guess alone all filmemojis.
  • Has hidden achievments...
